channel.title: Need some help making a shop : )
channel.description: need some help making a custom shop on a 317 pi, if someone could help that would be great. i want to make a special shop for my tokhaar-kal. i want to make it so you trade it a certian amount of firecapes to buy it, does anyone think they can help me make it?

Wait, 20 FCAPES FOR NEW FCAPE?!?!?!!?!

case 6570;
return 20;

for 6570 as the firecape id and 20 for how many it will take to buy it
